title: Mad.Max.Steam.Preload.Edition.Unlocker
description:
Install instructions:
Important Note: ONLY USE on the following preload release - Mad.Max.Steam.Preload.Edition-ALI213

1. Extract contents of "Mad.Max.sisInstall.ALI.2.1.3.zip" into the same folder as the CSM/CSD files from the extracted ALI213 preload release
2. Overwrite all files when prompted
3. Run "Unpack.bat"
4. Wait for crack as the game has Denuvo protection
Credits: sam2k8 for making the unlocker
